# URL Inventory for defiprime.com
#
# Format: one absolute URL path per line (relative to site root)
# Sorted alphabetically. Lines beginning with # are comments.
#
# Sources:
#   1. Blog posts (collections/_posts/): /{permalink} from front matter
#   2. Product collections (_lending, _exchanges, _derivatives, _analytics,
#      _assets-management-tools, _infrastructure, _insurance, _assets-tokenization,
#      _kyc_identity, _marketplaces, _prediction_markets, _stablecoins, _perps,
#      _payments, _staking, _dao, _alternative-savings, _yield-aggregators):
#      /product/{filename_without_extension_lowercased}
#   3. Airdrops (collections/_airdrops/): /airdrop/{title} from front matter (case-preserved)
#   4. Alternatives (collections/_alternatives/): /{permalink} from front matter
#   5. Events (collections/_events/): excluded (no output: true in _config.yml)
#   6. Top-level .md files: /{permalink} from front matter (index.md -> /)
#   7. Tag pages: /t/{tag_lowercased_hyphenated}.html (from all unique post tags)
#   8. Blog pagination: /blog/ and /blog/2/ .. /blog/25/ (391 posts, 16/page)
#   9. Special URLs: /feed.xml, /sitemap.xml, /404.html
#  10. Redirect source URLs from redirect_from fields
#
# Generated: 2026-02-26
# Total URLs: 717
#
